extendedInfo.description: Use Fingerprint Detector to detect fingerprints recently left on your phone's screen!Want to know whether there are fingerprints on your phone's screen? Want to know where are the fingerprints and what they look like? Fingerprint Detector will help you find answers. After you click the DETECT button, Fingerprint Detector scans your phone's screen to detect recently left fingerprints and shows them on the screen. New fingerprints may be detected if you touch the screen while the app is scanning.Well, this is just an entertaining app. It cannot really detect fingerprints. But it is a good choice to have fun with it and use it to prank others.
